description: This file defines the EbsVolume class, a resource representation for managing AWS EC2 EBS volumes, including methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting volumes, with detailed configuration and wait handling.

classes.name: EbsVolume
classes.description: Represents an AWS EC2 EBS volume resource with methods to create, read, update, delete, and wait for volume states.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates an EBS volume in AWS with specified configuration.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the volume to become available after creation if configured to do so.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and retrieves the current state of the volume from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the specified EBS volume, detaching it from instances if necessary.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the volume configuration such as IOPS, volume type, and throughput.

methods.name: get_volume_id
methods.description: Returns the volume ID of the EBS volume.
